attributes.action: Make the sale of Foie Gras illegal in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Althought the production of Foie Gras is illegal in the UK as well as other countries worldwide, it is not illegal to sell the product. In fact 'Selfridges' and 'Fortnum and Masons' are some of the only store to still consider the product acceptable for sale. Foie Gras is produced by force feeding geese and ducks grain so that there livers become oversized, other organs in their bodies can also rupture.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
